title: auction

agents.name: Agent A - Auctioneer
responsibilities: Collect bids, resolve ties, and declare winning allocations.
input: Bids from bidders plus reserve constraints.
output: Winning bids and a summary of allocations.

agents.name: Agent B - Market Coordinator
responsibilities: Define the auction rules and assign bidder roles.
input: Auction items, bidder constraints, and pricing rules.
output: A list of bidder tasks and auction timeline.

agents.name: Agent B-2 - Bidder 1
responsibilities: Compute a bid based on value and constraints.
output: A bid proposal with price and justification.

agents.name: Agent B-3 - Bidder 2
responsibilities: Compute a bid based on value and constraints.
output: A bid proposal with price and justification.

agents.name: Agent B-4 - Bidder 3
responsibilities: Compute a bid based on value and constraints.
output: A bid proposal with price and justification.

agents.name: Agent B-5 - Bidder 4
responsibilities: Compute a bid based on value and constraints.
output: A bid proposal with price and justification.

execution_flow: Coordinator defines auction rules and items.
Auctioneer selects winners and announces allocations.

ui_defaults.prompt: Allocate a limited GPU cluster (3 nodes) among four teams based on their stated value and urgency.

agentA.contract: Act as the auctioneer and finalize winning bids.

agentB.contract: Coordinate the auction and assign bidder roles.

workers.contract: Bid as Team 1 with a clear valuation.
Bid as Team 2 with a clear valuation.
Bid as Team 3 with a clear valuation.
Bid as Team 4 with a clear valuation.
